project_plan.name: Weather Fetcher CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches current weather information for a given city using a public API. The application will display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement the user interface to display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the fetching and parsing functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
